Module net.etf.project
Package net.etf.project.financial

Class Receipt

java.lang.Object
net.etf.project.financial.Receipt
public class Receipt extends Object
The Receipt class generates and stores financial information for a specific vehicle rental. It calculates the rental price, applies discounts or promotions, and generates a receipt file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Receipt(Rental rental)
    Constructs a Receipt object for a given rental and calculates the total price.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    double
    calculateRentalPrice(Rental rental)
    Calculates the total price for the rental, including discounts, promotions, and area factors.
    void
    generateReceipt()
    Generates a text file representing the receipt with details about the rental, total price, any discounts or promotions, and the area (wide or narrow) of the ride.

    Returns the discount applied to the rental.

    Returns the promotion applied to the rental.

  • Method Details

    • generateReceipt

      public void generateReceipt()
      Generates a text file representing the receipt with details about the rental, total price, any discounts or promotions, and the area (wide or narrow) of the ride.

    • calculateRentalPrice

      public double calculateRentalPrice(Rental rental)
      Calculates the total price for the rental, including discounts, promotions, and area factors.
      Parameters:
      rental - The rental for which the price is calculated.
      Returns:
      The final rental price after applying any applicable discounts and promotions.

    • getRental

      public Rental getRental()
      Returns the rental associated with this receipt.
      Returns:
      The rental object.

    • setRental

      public void setRental(Rental rental)
      Sets the rental associated with this receipt.
      Parameters:
      rental - The rental object to be set.

      Sets the discount amount for the rental.

    • getPromotion

    • isInWideArea

      public boolean isInWideArea()
      Returns whether the rental occurred in the wide area.
      Returns:
      true if the rental occurred in the wide area, false otherwise.

    • setInWideArea

      public void setInWideArea(boolean inWideArea)
      Sets whether the rental occurred in the wide area.
      Parameters:
      inWideArea - true if the rental occurred in the wide area, false otherwise.
